extendedInfo.description: Going out for a drink at Happy Hour?  Celebrating Hanukkah or Christmas at a bar?  Want to mix holiday drinks or order festive Christmas drinks?  Download this app!  Choose between a list of drinks or a shaker.  The list of drinks are organized into categories such as Holiday, Cocktails, Shooters, High Ball, Low Ball.  Then make a selection and an image of the drink plus the recipe appears!For the shaker, Just shake the phone to get a random selection of alcoholic drinks.  Cocktails and shooters are included.  Recipes are listed just in case you want to make at home or maybe the bartender hasn't heard of the drink you are requesting!Don't order a RUM and COKE!  Impress your co-workers, friends, classmates and dates with your wide knowledge of drinks!Shake for Fun!Example drinks-Angel's Wing-Berry Merry-Santa Sleigh-White Christmas-Cosmo-Crantini-Abacadabra-Chocotini-After 8Please email me if you have questions or comments.  aw@chowtunes.comKeywords: drink recipes,cocktails,drinksmixer,alcoholic drinks,coffee,recipes,recipes for making cocktails,food,diet,nutrition,education,bar,bartender,glasses

reviews.comment: Sucks... Don\'t try to install this app. Hung\'s up my phone constantly... (Booo)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only works on a few shakes then no more comes up after dat. Needs guide to search some of da good drinks that it has w/out shaking it to find it again
reviews.author: A Google User
